short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make This Page makes webpages editable!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you edit most of the webpages out there so that you can prank your friend. You can use this extension to change the content of the website. When you are in a given website, click the edit web page and it will let you edit the webpage.
